header.subtitle: introduction
header.text: hey! I'm **Nicolas**, web developer and photographer.

introduction.description: I design and code beautifully simple things and love what I do. As simple as that!

header.subtitle: about
header.text: Hey! I'm **Nicolas**, web developer and photographer.

about.description: I am passionate about this new stage of my career and look forward to working with you to bring your ideas and goals to life online. Feel free to browse my portfolio to discover some of my past projects.

list.title: Internship
list.subtitle: Internship at 'Agence-d.ca' - Startup specialized in staff placement. Contributions and participation in the creation of web pages and the development of their internal CMS.

descriptions.line: Technologies: React, Laravel, MySQL, MUI, Docker, Postman
GIT version control software and use of AGILE Methodology.
Design and development of dynamic web pages using React to provide an immersive and responsive user experience.
Help with the implementation of the internal CMS based on Laravel and MySQL to efficiently manage the content and functionalities of the website.
Experience with the Mui framework to design modern and user-friendly interfaces, thus improving the accessibility of the product.

list.title: Student, End-of-Program Project
list.subtitle: Creation of a responsive mobile website in a team

descriptions.line: Technology: React, Laravel, MySQL, Tailwind
GIT version control software and use of AGILE Methodology.
Design and multi-page design.
Collecting customer requirements and creating a specification document.

list.title: Student, School Project
list.subtitle: Execution of projects as part of the training

descriptions.line: Technologies: Proficient in React, Vue.js, Laravel, MySQl, JavaScript, PHP, Tailwind CSS, HTML5 and CSS for general purpose web development.
Git version control software for efficient code management and seamless team collaboration.
Organizing, coordinating and leading teams to ensure the successful execution of projects.
Overseeing project development and maintaining strong client relationships.
Technical assistance during implementation planning and maintenance.
Foster strong relationships with customers to support business growth.

list.title: Telecom Technician
list.location: Com-net - Montreal, Canada and various companies in France

descriptions.line: Performing thorough inspections, effective testing and successful implementation of fiber optic and copper networks.
Communication and coordination of development and completion of work.
Completion of various projects showcasing skills in teamwork, project management and client relations.
Creation of attractive, functional websites and visual and interactive interfaces, using programming languages as HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
Experience in designing, setting up and managing relational databases such as MySQL.
Learning technologies demanded on the market such as React, Vue.js and Laravel.
Installation of various electrical equipment and systems, ensuring compliance with industry regulations and standards.
Testing and maintenance of electrical systems.
Reading and interpreting plans or diagrams, facilitating precise implementation and effective troubleshooting.

mars.title: Mars Project
mars.subtitle: Create a static website with Laravel.
mars.description:
The project must have at least 4 routes pointed to the controller.
Have a form and use the POST method.
Process the received data and display it on a page.
Work with a 'Master' file and use 'blade' for views.

faceMaisonneuve.title: FaceMaisonneuve Project
faceMaisonneuve.subtitle: Create a student discussion website.
faceMaisonneuve.description:
Generate 15 cities, 100 students, and 10 articles using Faker Factory.
Implement methods to display, create, modify, and delete a student and/or article.
Create a login page with encrypted password.
Set up a multilingual system.

meteo.title: Weather Project
meteo.subtitle: Create a single page application with REST
meteo.description:
Create a nodeJS server.
Retrieve data from an API of our choice.
Update the JSON file when the server is launched.
Create pages to display different information returned by the API.

stampee.title: Stampee Project
stampee.subtitle: Create a multi-page auction site.
stampee.description:
Create visual identity, HTML and CSS pages, and a database.
The project should be MVC-based but without a framework.
Ability to create an account, modify it, create an ad, and bid on sales.

footer.line2: I am aware that the hue of green is very similar to the one used by Spotify. However, I have no control on the fact that they draw their inspiration from my creativity...
